text: Sylvester "Sly" James, Jr. (born December 9, 1951), is an American politician and lawyer. He was the 54th Mayor of Kansas City, Missouri from May 2, 2011 through August 1, 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official campaign website * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Mayors of Kansas City, Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African- American politicians
title: Sly James
